messages.message:
I'm unable to spin up a new sandbox, I'm seeing this error in `api-server`:
```docker build --cache-to=type=registry,ref=549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/api-server:cache,mode=max,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/api-server:cache,mode=max,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true) --cache-from=type=registry,ref=549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/api-server:cache (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/api-server:cache) --cache-to=type=registry,ref=549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/api-server:cache-hoangpaul14,mode=max,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/api-server:cache-hoangpaul14,mode=max,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true) --cache-from=type=registry,ref=549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/api-server:cache-hoangpaul14 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/api-server:cache-hoangpaul14) --progress=plain \
--build-arg BASE_PY_IMAGE_TAG=master \
--build-arg BASE_PY39_IMAGE_TAG=master \
-f Dockerfile -t instabase/api-server .
ERROR: failed to build: failed to receive status: rpc error: code = NotFound desc = no such job veuryh803298eda2cjjedz1dq```
and I'm seeing this issue in `server-nginx` (and core-platform) as well:
```#2 [internal] load metadata for 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/db:19 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/db:19)
#2 ERROR: 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/go:1.24.4 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/go:1.24.4): failed to resolve source metadata for 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/go:1.24.4 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/go:1.24.4): unexpected status from HEAD request to https://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/v2/instabase-build/go/manifests/1.24.4: 401 Unauthorized```
Here's a link to the box (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/hoangpaul14?cw=dev).

@Paul H I think I got your sandbox unstuck. I just merged two PRs that help with sandbox stability:

https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73303
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73298

I think you are also affected by this `idfed` problem. I ran `cs stop` to stop all serivces, then `cs start` again. That seems to fix the `idfed` problem.
All the healthchecks are passing except control-plane
